        public void arcadeDrive(double Xaxis,
               double Yaxis)
        Implements the Arcade capability of the drivetrain.
        Parameters:
        Xaxis - The X-Axis of the Joystick.
        Yaxis - The Y-Axis of the Joystick.

      • tankDrive

        public void tankDrive(double left,
             double right)
        Implements the Tank Drive capability of the drivetrain.
        Parameters:
        left - The speed for the left side of the drivetrain.
        right - The speed for the right side of the drivetrain.

      • initDefaultCommand

        public void initDefaultCommand()
        Description copied from class: edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
        Initialize the default command for a subsystem By default subsystems have no default command, but if they do, the default command is set with this method. It is called on all Subsystems by CommandBase in the users program after all the Subsystems are created.
        Specified by:
        initDefaultCommand in class edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
